wigner_d_halfpi_risbo_scalar Class Reference

#include <wigner.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class for calculation of the Wigner matrix at pi/2, using Risbo recursion in a way that cannot easily be parallelised, but is fairly efficient on scalar machines.
